title: Renting: Cell Phone (Usefulness 5-10)
description: Traveler usefulness 5-10/10 phrases for the Cell Phone subcategory within Renting. Includes 7 card(s).

cards.english: I’d like to rent a cell phone.

cards.japanese: この機種が欲しいです。

cards.romaji: Dono kishu ga hoshii desu ka?
cards.japanese: どの機種が欲しいですか？

cards.romaji: Tsuwa jikan o tsuika shite kudasai.
cards.japanese: 通話時間を追加してください。

cards.english: You have ten minutes left on your phone.
cards.romaji: Nokori no tsuwa jikan wa ju-ppun.
cards.japanese: 残りの通話時間は十分。

cards.english: I have 1 minute remaining to call.
cards.romaji: Tsuwa jikan no nokori wa ippun desu.
cards.japanese: 通話時間の残りは一分です。
